senses: smell hear

𓌢 𓈖 𓂉 smell/sense sansana @ Hausa
𓋴 𓋴 𓂉 breathe, smell|sense @ nose
𓋴 𓅓 𓄔 სმენა smena semaⁿ hear/sense ism IŠ-MU 𒅖𒈬 ⇔ 𒅖 kuš₇ > •haiš 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐍃 hörs "hear"
𓋴 𓂸 𓄔 ʃɛ:n šan "ear"@Tungusic ⇔ hear

סִימָן simán semn semantic sign (mark)

𒅆𒈨𒂊 šimee sense/hear
𒊺𒈠𒀀 semaa hear/sense
𒄿𒊺𒈪 i-še-mi listen/sense

𓋴 𓋴 𓈖 𓃀 𓏜 sanib : sane ⇔ sense

𓊸 (in)cense Geweihrauch

𓄟 𓋴 𓇥 𓂋 𓄔 masḏr 𓋴 𓂸 𓏏 𓄔 make-sentir make-hear ⇔ ⲙⲁϣϫ mašč 𓄔
